page.title: 02ICKFORD
page.content: Ickford is a small peaceful village. Most children like the playing field best.It has a climbing frame,a sand- pit and swing.There are some logs you can walk on.There is a new seesaw and a football pitch. There is one main shop that sells food,sweets and household things.Mrs Barton runs the shop with help from other people.There is another shop called Langon London Ltd. that sells garden things. There is a small church which is very interesting to look at.We have a new vicar Rev Andrew De Puray.The church is called St. Nicholas. The village hall we have was built by local carpenters and it was opened on the 16th of September 1950 after 1 and a half years of work.You can hire the hall for parties,discos etc. It is nice to have a hall in the village.
